mapper.select: SELECT menu_id AS menuId, menu_nm AS menuNm, client_menu_id AS clientMenuId, case when client_menu_id IS NULL then 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS useYn, ifnull(client_id, #{clientId}) AS clientId FROM tb_menu tm left JOIN ( SELECT menu_id, client_menu_id, client_id from tb_client_menu WHERE client_id = #{clientId} ) tcm USING(menu_id) WHERE par_menu_id = 0 AND menu_id <> 0 AND use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ord
mapper.insert: insert into tb_client_menu( menu_id, client_id, apply_yn, crt_id )values( #{menuId}, #{clientId}, #{applyYn}, #{crtId} )
mapper.update: update tb_client_menu set menu_id = #{menuId}, client_id = #{clientId}, apply_yn = #{applyYn}, where client_menu_id = #{clientMenuId}
